Weapon Master: Weapon Proficiency (Choose 4 from any)
Action Surge: May take an extra action 1/short rest
Alert: Cannot be surprised/Unseen foes gain no Adv on attacks on self
Charger: After a 10' Dash, may use a bonus action to attack (+5 damage) or to push 10'
Combat Superiority: May use 1d6 Superiority Dice to perform 2 chosen Maneuvers/short rest
Crossbow Expert: May make multiple attacks w/a proficient crossbow/Suffers no Disadv on a close shot/May make a bonus hand crossbow attack after a one-handed attack
Defensive Duelist: May use Reaction to gain +4 Armor Class when wielding a proficient finesse weapon
Distracting Strike: May add a Superiority Die to damage and to give Adv to the next ally attack against the same foe in the same rd
Dual Wielder: +1 Armor Class w/two weapons/May use two-weapon fighting w/any one-handed weapons/May draw or stow two weapons at once
Durable: Regains a minimum of 2 HP from a Hit Die roll
Fighting Style (Protection): May use Reaction and shield to inflict Disadv on attacks on an adjacent creature
Grappler: Adv on attacks on a grappled foe/May pin a grappled foe w/an additional successful attempt
Great Weapon Master: May make a bonus attack after crit or reducing foe to 0 HP/May suffer -5 attack w/a heavy weapon to gain +10 damage
Heavy Armor Master: In heavy armor, suffers -3 HP damage from nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing weapons
Improved Critical: Crits on a natural 19
Lunging Attack: May spend a Superiority Die to gain +5' melee range and add Superiority Die to damage
Mage Slayer: May use Reaction to attack an adjacent caster/Foe suffers Disadv on concentration to maintain a spell
Mobile: May Dash at full speed in difficult terrain/Suffers no OA from targeted foe
Mounted Combatant: Adv on melee attacks on an unmounted foe smaller than mount/May redirect attack on mount to self/Mount suffers no damage on a successful Dexterity save and half on failure
Polearm Master: Successful bonus attack w/polearm butt inflicts 1d4 HP bludgeoning/Foe entering polearm reach provokes OA
Savage Attacker: May take the best of two melee damage rolls 1/rd
Second Wind: May use a bonus action to regain 1d10+10 HP 1/short rest
Sentinel: Successful OA halts target/May take an OA when an adjacent foe uses Disengage/May use Reaction to attack when an adjacent foe targets another
Sharpshooter: Suffers no Disadv on attacks at long range/Range attacks ignore 3/4 cover/May suffer -5 attack w/a ranged weapon to gain +10 damage
Shield Master: May use a bonus action to shove foe during an attack
Tavern Brawler: May use a bonus action to grapple after a successful unarmed or improvised attack

Magic
Spell Slots: B0: 2; B1: 1; C0: 2; C1: 1; D0: 2; D1: 1; K0: 2; K1: 1; S0: 2; S1: 1; W0: 2; W1: 1 Attack: B: 8; C: 5; D: 5; K: 8; S: 8; W: 7 Spell DC: B: 16; C: 13; D: 13; K: 16; S: 16; W: 15
Spells:
Blade Ward (B0 Abju): Self gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing weapon damage for 1 rd
Fire Bolt (S0 Evoc): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 2d10 HP fire or ignites an unattended flammable target
Guidance (D0 Divi): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 ability check w/in conc up to 1 min
Hellish Rebuke (K1 Evoc): R60' May cast as a Reaction to inflict 2d10 HP fire on a successful attacker (Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Heroism (B1 Ench): Touched gains immunity to fright and +4 temporary HP each rd for conc up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Jump (D1 Tran): Touched gains triple jump distance for 1 min
Jump (S1 Tran): Touched gains triple jump distance for 1 min
Longstrider (W1 Tran): Touched gains +10' Speed for 1 hr [+Level affects +1 target]
Mage Hand (B0 Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks, moving up to 10 lb, for 1 min
Mage Hand (K0 Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks, moving up to 10 lb, for 1 min
Message (S0 Tran): R120' Self and target may hold a whispered conversation for 1 rd
Minor Illusion (K0 Illu): R30' Creates the sound of 1 creature or a 5' cube image (Investigation detects) for 1 min
Produce Flame (D0 Conj): Lights a 10' radius for 10 min; may use for a ranged spell attack inflicting 2d8 HP that ends spell
Purify Food And Drink (C1 Tran): R10' Removes poison and disease from nonmagical food and drink in a 5' radius [R]
Ray Of Frost (W0 Evoc): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP cold and -10' Speed for 1 rd
Resistance (C0 Abju): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 save w/in conc up to 1 min
Shocking Grasp (W0 Evoc): Touched suffers 2d8 HP lightning and cannot use Reaction until next turn
Thaumaturgy (C0 Tran): R30' Creates minor magic effects for 1 min
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Bard): Knows 2 B0 spells/May cast chosen B1 spell 1/long rest
Magic Initiate (Cleric): Knows 2 C0 spells/May cast chosen C1 spell 1/long rest
Magic Initiate (Druid): Knows 2 D0 spells/May cast chosen D1 spell 1/long rest
Magic Initiate (Sorcerer): Knows 2 S0 spells/May cast chosen S1 spell 1/long rest
Magic Initiate (Warlock): Knows 2 K0 spells/May cast chosen K1 spell 1/long rest
